Are you sure this is not simply a documentation bug and we should remove
the doc given the effect of using the debug attribute?

The documentation talks about the "ParseView debugger" and I have no idea what
that is, nor what the attribute has been expected to do.

OK, I've looked up the command line reference of antlr just now, seems your change
is what should be done.
should be fixed in nightly build 2003-04-17
creator: bodewig@apache.org
jorgemanrubia@terra.es
text:
OK. Perhaps I didn't explain it very well. The code I posted was what I 
thought it should be, not a fragment of code that was commented in the sources.

ParseView is a tool that let you make a visual-debugging of the parsing 
proccess with ANTLR. It's a window that is shown when the the parser starts 
(when you use -debug with antlr when generating the parsers).

I'm surprised of such as fast-fixing of the bug. (less than one day XD)
